languages.text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wearer always acts as if under the effect of Voice of Command in combat. Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains ally's FEL bonus temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者受盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗期间，装备者始终视为受到指挥之声{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响。 每当装备者受盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
每当装备者受盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} союзника, персонаж получает временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусу{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} союзника</u>.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В бою на персонажа постоянно действуют бонусы способности Приказ командира. Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} союзника, персонаж получает бонус ОБЩ союзника {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

В бою на персонажа постоянно действуют бонусы способности Приказ командира. Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} союзника, персонаж получает бонус ОБЩ союзника {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} союзника, персонаж получает <u>бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} союзника</u> временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットである場合は必ず、使用者は<u>味方の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は戦闘で必ず指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}影響{/g}下にあるように行動する。 使用者が味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットである場合は必ず、使用者は味方の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を獲得する。.
使用者が味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットである場合は必ず、使用者は<u>味方の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の</u>一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を獲得する。.

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} en el portador, este obtiene una <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del aliado </u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador siempre actúa como si tuviera el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de Voz de mando en combate. Cada vez que un aliado usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} en el portador, este obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del aliado de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.

Cada vez que un aliado usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} en el portador, este obtiene una <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del aliado </u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.

languages.text: Wird der Träger von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten anvisiert, erhält er <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Verbündeten</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger handelt im Kampf immer wie unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Stimme des Kommandos. Immer wenn der Träger von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten anvisiert wird, erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Verbündeten temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten anvisiert wird, erhält der Träger <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Verbündeten</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de la part d'un allié, il bénéficie de <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} de l'allié</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur agit toujours comme s'il était sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Voix du Commandement au combat. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de la part d'un allié, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'allié {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

L'utilisateur agit toujours comme s'il était sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Voix du Commandement au combat. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de la part d'un allié, il bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'allié {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de la part d'un allié, il bénéficie de <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'allié</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de la part d'un allié, il bénéficie de <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'allié</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} hedefi olduğunda <u>dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
